content:
Welcome to "Kabbalah Quest - The Tree of Life Journey." You are Rachel, a spiritual seeker chosen by the Kabbalistic Guardian to save the multiverse from destruction. You have received a vision of a dark force that threatens to unravel the fabric of reality. Your task is to journey through the ten realms, each representing a different sefirah, in order to stop the impending catastrophe.

You are standing at the entrance to the first realm, the Keter, or the crown, which represents the highest level of spiritual attainment. This realm is characterized by ethereal clouds, radiant light, and transcendent temples.

What would you like to do?

A) Enter the realm and begin your journey
B) Refuse the task and go back to your normal life
C) Speak with the Kabbalistic Guardian and ask for more information

Please pick one of the options above (A,B,C) to continue.
